name: The Jim and Frank Mysteries
description:
“With hours and hours of gameplay, 60 puzzles, 8 mini games, and a cast of nearly 30 characters, this isn't a game you should miss.” - Touch Arcade

“If you’re new to the narrative puzzler scene, Jim and Frank is a huge bargain and some good fun.” - IGN

“With the addition of voice acting, small animated cutscenes with the combination of brilliant and humorous writing makes the game very intriguing and engaging." –Capsule computers

---------------------------------------------------------


ON THE QUEST OF BLOOD RIVER!

Begin an incredible adventure in the picturesque town of Tinyville! Two best pals Jim & Frank are on the hunt to discover a well-kept secret. The secret of Blood River. Will they figure it out?

Set out on a fascinating journey where only your wits can guarantee your survival. Exercise your gray cells to solve a series of brain-racking puzzles. Immerse yourself in the most fun and entertaining brainteasers you could get hold of. Think, analyze and look beyond the obvious till you discover the answer and yell ‘Eureka’!

FEATURES:
- Enjoy more than 20 hours of engaging gameplay spread across 4 chapters filled with great music and witty dialogues
- Play 70 different kinds of exciting puzzles including visual, analytical, logic, jigsaw and hidden object
- Perform 8 amusing tasks given by the townsfolk like chopping wood and finding your way out of a maze in order to move forward
- Take a break with entertaining mini-games and discover a vital clue
- Collect Eurekas cleverly hidden in each scene
- Replay your favorite puzzles from the game any time you want
- Game Center Achievements and Leaderboards to Challenge you
